name: @tinijs/ui-skeleton
description: A skeleton for building Tini UI packages.
author: Lam Nhan

scripts.build: npm run sync && npm run build:0:app && npm run build:1:icons && npm run build:2:untitled
scripts.build:1:icons: tini ui icon tinix-icons ./icons && parcel build build/tinix-icons/*.bundle.ts --dist-dir build/tinix-icons --no-cache --no-source-maps --log-level warn
scripts.build:2:untitled: tini ui build tinix untitled && parcel build build/tinix-untitled/components/*.bundle.ts --dist-dir build/tinix-untitled/components --no-cache --log-level warn
